name: Arcane Archer
description: Arcane Archers blend martial mastery with arcane magic, imbuing their arrows with powerful magical effects.

3.name: Arcane Archery
3.description: You learn to unleash special magical effects with your arrows. You learn two Arcane Shot options of your choice. Once per turn when you fire a magic arrow from a shortbow or longbow, you can apply one of your Arcane Shot options. You can use this feature twice, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

3.name: Magic Arrow
3.description: Starting at 3rd level, whenever you fire a nonmagical arrow from a shortbow or longbow, you can make it magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

7.name: Curving Shot
7.description: At 7th level, when you make an attack roll with a magic arrow and miss, you can use a bonus action to reroll the attack roll against a different target within 60 feet of the original target.

10.name: Additional Arcane Shot
10.description: At 10th level, you learn one additional Arcane Shot option of your choice.

15.name: Ever-Ready Shot
15.description: Starting at 15th level, when you roll initiative and have no uses of Arcane Shot remaining, you regain one use of it.

18.name: Improved Arcane Archery
18.description: At 18th level, you learn one additional Arcane Shot option of your choice, and you can use Arcane Shot three times between rests instead of twice.
